title: Create step-topics component for Step 4 with multi-select chips
description:
Create the topics selection component with toggleable chips.

File to create: app/fo-03/components/step-topics.tsx

Step 4 - Topics multi-select:
- Headline: What do you want affirmations to help you with, {name}?
- Text: Choose as many as you like
- Toggleable chips (many): Motivation, Focus, Inner peace, Energy boost, Better sleep, Body peace, Self-worth, Boundaries, Letting go, Healing, Gratitude, Positivity, Resilience, Anxiety relief, Stress relief, Courage, Hope, Joy, Patience, Mindfulness, Self-care, Forgiveness, Connection, Self-love, Breakup healing, Impulse control, Digital detox, Productivity, Morning boost, Night calm, Confidence, Calm, Self-discipline, Overthinking, Grief, Loneliness
- CTAs: Not sure (skips step) / Continue
- On Continue: Show confetti + 'Great choices!' then advance

Chip behavior:
- Click to toggle selected state
- Selected chips highlighted
- Multiple selections allowed
- Store selections in state.topics array
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; grep -l 'Motivation' app/fo-03/components/step-topics.tsx returns the file
closed_reason: Created step-topics.tsx with 36 toggleable topic chips, confetti on Continue, 'Great choices\!' success message with 1.5s auto-advance, and 'Not sure' skip option. Updated fo-experience.tsx to import and render StepTopics at step 4.
